message.entry: The specified rectangle is not fully contained within the figure. MATLAB no longer supports this capability.
MATLAB figure windows are disabled. GETFRAME can not capture any part of a figure's frame, menus, or toolbars unless figure windows are displayed.
MATLAB figure windows are disabled. GETFRAME can not capture figures with UI controls unless figure windows are displayed.
Specified rectangular area must be within the bounds of the figureâ€™s Position property. This argument will be ignored.
In a future release, the rect argument must specify a rectangle within the boundaries of the figure, excluding the menu bar and toolbar.
Specify a single axes or figure object.
